title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 212 - PROCESS OPERATIONS
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 212 - PROCESS OPERATIONS
State Regulations

Subpart 212-1 - General Provisions (§ 212-1.1 to 212-1.7)

Subpart 212-2 - Allowable Emissions (§ 212-2.1 to 212-2.5)

Subpart 212-3 - Reasonably Available Control Technology for Major Facilities (§ 212-3.1)

Subpart 212-4 - [Repealed] (§ 212-4.1)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 212

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§1-0101, 1-0303, 3-0301, 19-0103, 19-0105, 19-0107, 19-0301, 19-0303, 19-0305, 19-0311, 71-2103, 71-2105

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Subpart 212-1 - General Provisions (§ 212-1.1 to 212-1.7)

Subpart 212-2 - Allowable Emissions (§ 212-2.1 to 212-2.5)

Subpart 212-3 - Reasonably Available Control Technology for Major Facilities (§ 212-3.1)

Subpart 212-4 - Control of nitrogen oxides for hot mix asphalt production plants (§ 212-4.1)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 212

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§1-0101, 1-0303, 3-0301, 19-0103, 19-0105, 19-0107, 19-0301, 19-0303, 19-0305, 19-0311, 71-2103, 71-2105
